mapper.select: SELECT custId , custNm , custTel1 , custTel2 , custTel3 , faxTel1 , faxTel2 , faxTel3 , CASE WHEN (c.budAmt) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE budAmt END budAmt , reqContent , email , activeTp , (select commNm from commcd where commCd = activeTp ) activeTpNm , publicYn , (CASE WHEN publicYn = 'Y' THEN '공동' END) publicYnNm , DATE_FORMAT(frstRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') as frstRegDt , frstRegUser frstRegNm , (SELECT mbrNm FROM member m WHERE m.mbrId = c.mbrId ) mbrNm , (CASE WHEN #{publicYn} = 'Y' THEN (case when #{user.mbrId} != c.mbrId then 'N' else 'Y' END ) ELSE 'Y' END) modifyYn FROM customer c WHERE custId = #{custId}
